<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/collections"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a paginated list of collections.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"limit","in":"query","description":"Maximum number of items to return","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":100,"default":20}},{"name":"after","in":"query","description":"Cursor for forward pagination","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"before","in":"query","description":"Cursor for backward pagination","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"owner_id","in":"query","description":"Filter by owner identity ID","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
